name: Clergy Splode
description: In the life of every Clergy Priest, there comes a moment when it turns out that there is no other solution than.... to just drop bombs everywhere and blow everything up... Clergy Splode is a fast paced, casual-arcade game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

reviews.review_text: Yet another lazy mobile port. Resolution is locked at 1280 x 768. There are no rebindable keys, which if you are left handed like me, makes the game pretty much unplayable past the first few levels. Plus the game suffers from some of the worst screen tearing issues I have seen in a non-idtech game. You'd be much better off just playing this on mobile since no effort was made to make the port PC friendly.
